column4: What repository should I add so that adobe-flashprayer package would be contained within it?
flashprayer? :D it's in the standard Ubuntu repos (multiverse I think)
Ah, sory, it's just called flashplayer-nonfree
do you have the right repos enabled?
I tried to enable medibuntu, but it failed with E: Couldn't find package medibuntu-keyring
Did you follow the wiki instructions?
Yes, help.ubuntu.com
For intrepid: execute: "sudo wget http://www.medibuntu.org/sources.list.d/intrepid.list --output-document=/etc/apt/sources.list.d/medibuntu.list"
then: "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install medibuntu-keyring && sudo apt-get update"
Thanks, I forgot to include output . =(
OO3 should be there?
no, neither OOo 3 or KDE 4 are there
hold on, I'll find the repos
OOo3 repo instructions: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=987181
Thanks a lot, as for KDE4.2, I've been already advised at #kubuntu
OK, Cool
do an apt-get clean then dist-upgrade
apt-get -f dist-upgrade
the repo appears to be unreachable
is your internet connection down?
Nope, perfectly fine.
So far reproduced the same behaviour on two separate machines in two separate networks.
Possibly a problem with the repo itself
Whom should I bug? =)
